note: Nintendo's mobile titles are typically either 'Free-to-Start' with a one-time purchase to unlock the full game (Super Mario Run) or full Free-to-Play with Gacha/Lootbox mechanics (Mario Kart Tour, Fire Emblem Heroes). They generally feature minimal cartoon violence and are rated for younger audiences.

pricing.price_usd: Free to Download/Start. Full Game Unlock: $9.99 (One-time IAP).

gamekit_integration.leaderboards: Yes (via Toad Rally and possibly Game Center)
gamekit_integration.achievements: Yes (Integrated with Apple Game Center Achievements)

content_description.violence: None (or extremely mild fantasy violence, i.e., stomping a Goomba).

pricing.price_usd: Free (Offers In-App Purchases from $0.99 - $69.99, including 'Gold Pass' subscription)

gamekit_integration.leaderboards: Yes (The game has its own competitive tier-based ranking/league system, which is sometimes mirrored to Game Center)
gamekit_integration.achievements: Likely (Utilizes a mission/badge system that can integrate with Game Center)

content_description.violence: None (or mild cartoon violence/fantasy violence from item use)
content_description.other_content_warnings: Contains Simulated Gambling (due to the use of 'Pipes' which function as gacha/loot boxes)

pricing.price_usd: Free (Offers In-App Purchases from $0.99 - $79.99, featuring the 'Orb' currency for Gacha)

content_description.violence: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence (Turn-based combat with stylized anime presentation)
content_description.nudity_sexual_content: Infrequent/Mild Suggestive Themes (Due to some character designs/art)
content_description.other_content_warnings: Contains Simulated Gambling (Gacha mechanic for summoning heroes)

pricing.price_usd: Free (Offers In-App Purchases from $0.99 - $79.99, featuring 'Leaf Ticket' currency)
